content.body: I'm trying to track down who took over my company's website domain and is now trying to sale it. I've been directed to here. Can anyone help?
[JLov](https://matrix.to/#/@jlouv:matrix.org)I think either you misunderstood, or the person who directed you was confused.
content.formatted_body: JLovI think either you misunderstood, or the person who directed you was confused.

content.body: Possibly. Can you explain what goes on here?
Discussion on the html5 specification. You want something related to dns, possibly start with icann.org
I'd suggest contacting the registrar that the domain is/was registered with.
